Package it.uniba.piece.rook

Class Rook

java.lang.Object
it.uniba.piece.Piece
it.uniba.piece.rook.Rook
public class Rook
extends Piece
This is the class of Rook
Responsibility
This class can:
- define Rook's characteristics
- define Rook's feature
- define Rook's movements and capture rules
This class know:
- what are the characteristics of a piece

This class is " entity ".
